Congratulations!!! You COM" How to play Place Ships Touch a ship ① then touch a cell on board ② to place ship, the touched cell will be the ship's head. Touch a ship placed on board and click Rotate button ③ to rotate the ship. ★Two ships can't be placed right next to each other, there must be at least one cell of space between them. Touch the All Random button ④ to place all ships randomly. You can still edit them later. When all ships are placed on board, touch Next button ⑤ to play. Game Play Your board is on the left, enemy's board is on the right.
 Select a cell on enemy's board to shoot.
 ⚠If you get a HIT or KILL, you can shoot one more time. If you get a MISS, you lose your turn. Same with enemy.
 One who first destroy all enemy's ships wins the game. HIT KILL MISS Close ⚠︎Can't place ship here. ⚠︎Can't rotate ship. ⚠︎Select a ship placed on board to rotate. ⚠︎Place all ship on the board to play. Music Sound
